name: Generate Task Proposal
description: Generate AI-powered next-action proposals for tasks using Ollama deepseek-r1:14b on Mac Studio. Triggered by sparkles button on dashboard.

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'deepseek-r1:14b', prompt: $json.prompt, stream: false, options: { temperature: 0.3 } }) }}
={{ JSON.stringify({ task_id: $json.task_id, proposed_action: $json.next_action, reasoning: $json.reasoning, action_type: $json.action_type, source: 'ollama-deepseek-r1-14b', status: 'pending' }) }}
